<h4>Description</h4>
UL16-binding protein 3 ([ULBP3](https://www.uniprot.org/uniprot/Q9BZM4)). Binds and activates the KLRK1/NKG2D receptor, mediating natural killer cell cytotoxicity.

<br> 

<h4>Clinical trials</h4>
[NCT04107142](https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT04107142) - Colorectal Cancer, Prostate Cancer, Sarcoma

<br>
